title: The Indochina and Vietnam Wars - a Collection
description:
The Indochina and Vietnam Wars - a Collection:

We have 35 titles in this new series:

-  Anderson (Ed.) - The Columbia History of the Vietnam War (2011)

-  Appy - American Reckoning; the Vietnam War and Our National Identity (2015)

-  Brown - War and Aftermath in Vietnam (1991)

-  Chong - The Girl in the Picture; the Story of Kim Phuc, the Photograph, and the Vietnam War (1999)

-  Edwards - Australia and the Vietnam War (2014)

-  Ellison - Chemical Warfare During the Vietnam War; Riot Control Agents in Combat (2011)

-  Fry - The American South and the Vietnam War; Belligerence, Protest, and Agony in Dixie (2015)

-  Grant - The Vietnam War (2012)

-  Gray & Martin - The American War in Indochina; Injustice and Outrage (2008)

-  Hanyok - Spartans in the Darkness; American SIGINT and the Indochina War, 1945-1975 (2002)

-  Herzog - Vietnam War Stories; Innocence Lost (1992)

-  Hess - Vietnam; Explaining America's Lost War, 2e (2015)

-  Hillstrom & Hillstrom - Vietnam War Primary Source (2001)

-  Hunt - Losing Vietnam; How America Abandoned Southeast Asia (2013)

-  Isserman - Vietnam War, Updated Edition (2003)

-  Jones - Death of a Generation; How the Assassinations of Diem and JFK Prolonged the Vietnam War (2003)

-  Kalb & Kalb - Haunting Legacy; Vietnam and the American Presidency from Ford to Obama (2011)

-  Krall - A Thousand Years Falling; the True Story of a Vietnamese Family Torn Apart by War, Communism, and the CIA (1995)

-  Kwon - Ghosts of War in Vietnam (2008)

-  Larsen & Collins - Allied Participation in the Vietnam (1975)

-  Lawrence - Assuming the Burden; Europe and the American Commitment to War in Vietnam (2005)

-  Maga - The Vietnam War; The Complete Idiot Guide (2000)

-  Maraniss - They Marched into Sunlight; War and Peace, Vietnam and America, October 1967 (2003)

-  Moise - The A to Z of the Vietnam War (2005)

-  Morgan - Valley of Death; the Tragedy at Dien Bien Phu that Led America into the Vietnam War (2010)

-  Olson & Roberts - Where the Domino Fell; America and Vietnam, 1945-2010, 6e (2014)

-  Randolph - Powerful and Brutal Weapons; Nixon, Kissinger, and the Easter Offensive (2007)

-  Schmitz - Richard Nixon and the Vietnam War; the End of the American Century (2014)

-  Thompson - Refugee Workers in the Indochina Exodus, 1975-1982 (2010)

-  VanDeMark - Into the Quagmire; Lyndon Johnson and the Escalation of the Vietnam War (1995)

-  Vo (Ed.) - The Viet Kieu in America; Personal Accounts of Postwar Immigrants from Vietnam (2009)

-  Warren - Giap; the General Who Defeated America in Vietnam (2013)

-  Westing - Herbicides in Warfare; the Case of Indochina, (in Ecotoxicology and Climate, 1989)

-  Westing - The Environmental Aftermath of Warfare in Viet Nam, Natural Resources Journal, Vol. 23 (April, 1983)

-  Woods (Ed.) - Vietnam and the American Political Tradition; the Politics of Dissent (2003)
